a.title: Information about the use of the element

a.title: Minimum and Maximum # of times the the element can appear in the instance

a.title: Legend for this format

publisher.value: University of San Agustin - Center for Informatics

description.value: Patient data model implemented in UnEMR

definition.value: Patient data model implemented in UnEMR
Patient identifier
Patient status (e.g. active, inactive, pending approval)
Name of patient
Email of patient
Phone number of patient
Gender of the patient
Birthday of the patient. Required for the calculation of age
Defines where the patient resides
Person identified as emergency contact of the patient
Name of the emergency contact

short.value: Relationship of the contact to the patient

definition.value: Relationship of the contact to the patient
Address of the emergency contact person
Phone number of the emergency contact person
Email address of the emergency contact person
The provider handling the patient
The provider referred by the primary provider to handle the patient
The provider chosen by the patient for consultation. The provider is chosen from a list of providers accessible to the patient
Notes describing the referral
Allergies of the patient
Immunization history of the patient
History of medications taken by the patient relevant to the current consultation
Additional notes about the patient

short.value: Additional comments regarding this patient record

definition.value: Additional comments regarding this patient record
Consent agreed upon by the patient regarding their patient data
Record audit log
Person who created the patient record

short.value: Date when the patient record was created

definition.value: Date when the patient record was created

short.value: Person who recently updated the record

definition.value: Person who recently updated the record

short.value: Date when the patient record last updated

definition.value: Date when the patient record last updated
